quick_answer.text: A 12 oz can of Coca Cola Zero contains 0 calories and 0 g sugar.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a can of Coca Cola Zero?

faqs.a: No sugar and 0 g carbs, sweetened with artificial sweeteners.
